subject: Photography
Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Smartphones
Social Media
lead_paragraph: An increasing number of spectators lining the Tour de France’s route are taking self-portraits with the riders as the background, adding a danger to a sport already fraught with them.
snippet: An increasing number of spectators lining the Tour de France’s route are taking self-portraits with the riders as the background, adding a danger to a sport already fraught with them.
